text: The Universidade Federal do Paraná - UFPR (Federal University of Paraná) is the oldest Brazilian university. It is located in the Southern Brazilian state of Paraná. The university was created on December 19, 1912. Its facilities are scattered over the capital Curitiba and other cities of the state. Category:Colleges and universities in Brazil Category:Paraná State Category:1912 establishments in Brazil
title: Federal University of Paraná
